name: DR1FT (FancyRat)
description:
DR1FT is a game about drifting and driving, with constant updates to make it up to date and diferent types of cars and some features coming soon as:

Multiplayer, Android support, more races bugfixes and a lot more.

The game was compressed using Unity 3D's LZ4HC for storage reasons, if it has any bugs, tell me on the comments tab.

Now in GameJolt:

https://gamejolt.com/games/dr1ft/770731

Updates announced on Twitter and YouTube:

https://twitter.com/FancyRatGames1
